experience.title: Head of Startup Curation
experience.description: - Built deep relationships across the ecosystem including Unicorn Founders, Shark Tank Sharks, Lead Investors - Sourced 80+ companies for fundraising across SAAS, Deeptech & Healthtech Predominantly from 500+ pitches - Secured 200+ crore INR fundraising allocation across early stage startups- Identified & Curated 60+ companies for Shark Tank season 2 along with Team Sony- Organized flagship on-ground events such as "Lets-Ignite 2022" & "Lets Raise with Peyush Bansal" - Angel invested in 8 startups across deep tech, career-tech, fintech and app aggregator sectors

experience.title: Entrepreneur In Residence
experience.description: - Created first ever B2C sales channel for a Hemoglobin Monitoring Device, 0 to 2000 customers in 6 months - Built relationships with 150+ doctors in NCR, enabling marketing and sales of the Hemoglobin Monitor - Established product positioning across 2 crticial health scenarios: Pregnancy and CKD use cases

experience.title: Co-founder & Director
experience.description: I'm the Co-founder of a full-service digital agency built for the now. We partner with clients to drive better business outcomes with best-in-class video production, media planning, distribution, influencer marketing, and everything in between.We use insights gained through micro-content to build creative campaigns for clients, that drive actual business results.We have grown from 20 team members with clients from 7+ locations including Chennai, Hyderabad, Bangalore, Delhi, etc.We worked with some of the biggest companies in South India including GRT group of companies, SPR Group, Vasanth TV, Express Group. Our specialties are:Full Service CreativePaid MediaInfluencer MarketingMarket ResearchYou can contact us here:

education.title: Indian Institute of Technology, Madras
education.description: I have taken my dual degree in the Department of Mechanical Engineering at IIT Madras for B.Tech and M.Tech with specialisation in Intelligent Manufacturing. For the ten-semester dual degree programme, students are selected through the highly competitive Joint Entrance Examination (JEE) conducted at the national level in which only about 1% of the candidates who appear for this examination are selected for admissions to different IITs. recommendations: Rohit Raheja ‚ÄúVamsi has been a source of inspiration for me to step foot into the startup ecosystem!His knowledge exceed his years and his determination, drive and commitment has been a great source of learning for me personally!Vamsi will thrive in any situation which demands out of the box thinking and his belief in the possibilities will push his team mates to give their best possible efforts towards the project!‚Äù

Renganathan Subramanian ‚ÄúI was a business development intern at Real Tycoon. As a first time intern with zero knowledge of the subject or of a workspace, I found an ideal mentor in Vamsi. He possesses a no nonsense attitude. This is crucial in a booming startup with a mark to earn. His unique outlook of dispensing work to interns, based not solely on the company needs but on the intern's goals and future utility, instigates the interns to work for themselves. This increases the efficacy of the work and proves advantageous for the company too.‚Äù
